basic_info.description: I'm Devon. I'm a US Navy Seabee who is a current software developer. I studied architecture, before joining the miliatry back in 2013. I decided to take up the challenge of software development. The thing about tech, that interest me, is that it is a part of our everyday lives. It can connect us all, and it can be used to change the world for better.

projects.title: LeeRoy Jenkins Travel Agency
projects.description: This was a group project for the final project of course 201 for code fellows. It was challenging in the sense that we were a group of four that had to come together to accomplish it, but ironically enough, thats the same thing that made it a seamsless experience.

projects.title: Odd-Duck
projects.description: This was a project where I was tasked with creating a mock interactive survey. It uses images that may be clicked on and that data is stored in local storage and can be rendered on a chart at the end of the voting period.

projects.title: Chocolate Pizza
projects.description: This was a pair programming assingment, where I worked with one other member of the class. It was a pure CSS assignment, where we had to recreate a page with some given assets, using only CSS.
